title: Why can't i buy god staff jax?
body: i can't buy god staff jax.when i go to the market it doesn't let me buy it.

replies.body: New content like skins don't release right away.  Keep your eye on the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for updates on the awakening of our great and might Jax.  :D
How much we have to wait before it will become purchasable?
Because they felt like only releasing the splash art was a better idea (joking btw)

He's in the patch **but not released yet.**

They always stagger patch content so each item can get its time to shine.
me too i have the same problem
